com.linecorp.armeria.common

Interface RpcResponse

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.lang.Object>, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Object>, Response
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRpcResponse

    public interface RpcResponse
extends Response, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Object>, java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.lang.Object>
    An RPC Response. It is a CompletionStage whose result signifies the return value of an RPC call.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Throwable cause()
      Returns the cause of the failure if this RpcResponse completed exceptionally.
      default java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<?> closeFuture()
      Returns a CompletableFuture which completes when this RpcResponse completes.
      boolean isCompletedExceptionally()
      Returns true if this RpcResponse completed exceptionally.
      static RpcResponse of(java.lang.Object value)
      Creates a new successfully complete RpcResponse.
      static RpcResponse ofFailure(java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Creates a new exceptionally complete RpcResponse.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.concurrent.Future

        cancel, get, get, isCancelled, isDone

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage
